title: Internet per game of lol
body:
Hey, i was wondering how much net does i lol game go for???
my mates keep saying its only 10/mb per game but when i look at the amont of internet is used i go through 3gb in 1 hour like wtf is wrong with this please help, if there is away to fix it could you please tell me and nothing with get more internet have money problems so that out the window. But still help please

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have this exact information on hand.  3 GB in one hour does sound a bit much, though.  There may be other programs running in the background taking that data.  I recommend reaching out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can help you find out what's going on.
